content:
I don’t see any media files in the vault — no media/ directory or image files (.png/.jpg/etc.) were found.

What I do find are docs referencing image/media projects (so we have context but no stored assets):
- knowledge/projects/agentic-imagery-exploration.md
- knowledge/projects/prologue-cad.md
- knowledge/projects/cl_draw.md
- knowledge/system/nano-banana-pro.md
- knowledge/projects/vibewire.md (prior pivot to media)

Next steps I can take:
- create a media/ folder and generate an image (use generate_image) and save it there,
- import/upload media you point me to,
- re-scan the vault for other file types, or
- list all docs that mention images in more detail.

Which would you like me to do?
